column4: just installed Ubuntu 12.04 LTS on a new Lenovo 581.  Am unable to setup LAN and WLAN and am suspecting it's a case of drivers.  LAN is Atheros AR8161/8165 and WLAN is Broadcom 802.11n.  Tried google but to no avail.  Any help herein?
try DLing those device drivers on a different machine onto a usb and install them that way
lemme give it a try and may you'll earn yourself a beer
Its certainly unusual that both your cards are not recognized - its usually one or the other
